Package backend.user

Class UserDataAccess

java.lang.Object
backend.database.DataAccess
backend.user.UserDataAccess
public class UserDataAccess extends DataAccess
Helper class to have database access fo all user fields

    • deleteAccount

      public boolean deleteAccount​(@Nonnull String docId) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException, NoSuchElementException
      Delete a specific user account
      Parameters:
      docId - The document id of the user
      Returns:
      true if successful
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If .get() on a future fails
      InterruptedException - If there is concurrency problem with the database
      NoSuchElementException - If the user does not exist

      Parameters:
      uid - User id
      carId - Car id
      Returns:
      True if the user has the car, false otherwise
